statements: SELECT * FROM multi_cloud_logging;
SELECT id, event_type, event_time, event_description FROM multi_cloud_logging;
SELECT event_description, event_type FROM multi_cloud_logging;
SELECT * FROM multi_cloud_logging WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_description FROM multi_cloud_logging WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT * FROM multi_cloud_logging ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT id, event_type FROM multi_cloud_logging WHERE event_type = 'Error';
SELECT id, event_description FROM multi_cloud_logging WHERE event_description LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT id, event_type, event_time FROM multi_cloud_logging WHERE event_type = 'Warning' ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT id, event_time, event_description FROM multi_cloud_logging WHERE event_time > '2022-01-01' AND event_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM cloud_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT cloud_provider, log_message FROM cloud_logs WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, cloud_provider, log_message, date_time FROM cloud_logs ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE activity LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_logs WHERE cloud_provider='AWS';
SELECT id, log_message FROM cloud_logs WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, activity FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-31' AND activity LIKE '%login%';
SELECT cloud_provider, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM cloud_logs GROUP BY cloud_provider ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_provider_logs;
SELECT cloud_provider_name, log_time FROM cloud_provider_logs WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, action FROM compliance_audit_logs WHERE id > 10 AND audit_id = 5;
SELECT database_name, query_text FROM database_usage_logs WHERE query_time > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY query_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_provider_logs WHERE cloud_provider_name = 'AWS' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT id, action, username FROM compliance_audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action ASC, username DESC;
SELECT database_name, query_text FROM database_usage_logs WHERE query_time BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, cloud_provider_name, log_time FROM cloud_provider_logs WHERE cloud_provider_name IN ('Azure', 'Google Cloud') ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit_logs WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_location = 'US';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers LIMIT 5;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_name = 'AWS';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT action_type, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved' AND generated_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, details FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT instance_name, created_date FROM database_instances WHERE cloud_provider_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM cloud_providers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, details FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT provider_name, count(*) AS total_instances FROM cloud_providers JOIN database_instances ON cloud_providers.provider_id = database_instances.cloud_provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_timestamp) AS latest_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_activity DESC;
